notes.title: New update
notes.text:
- Added Quad Tab support for Stash Highlight!
- Now you can reselect your game folder in Settings.
- Response buttons are now a bit bigger. Later we'll add Scalability in Settings.
- Trade whispers of any kind are now fully supported.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements, lots of.

Thanks guys for all your feedback and support! If you're experiencing issues with updating, please download the app directly from Github as our server struggles to handle that many people.
